title: SDR5
explain:
SDR5 is a high frequency, line of sight microwave communication equipment, can be constructed without center, distributed mode, the wireless mobile communication system can be fast real-time networking. SDR5 multi-beam antennas and mobile self-networking, can replace traditional point-multipoint microwave or UHF radio technology, it can be realized within a radius of 30km range, line of sight for communication networking up to 16 nodes. The equipment can be used for rapid deployment needs for inter-station / position communication, such as EW inter-station communication, air defense weapons system inter-station communication and etc.
  • Support without center networking;
  • Support mobile communication;
  • Compare to the traditional radio ,the SDR5 can provide double the capacity supply;
  • Compare to the traditional point to multipoint microwave, the SDR5 distribution station is more flexible;
  • Support IP interface;
  • Support voice, data, images and other integrated services.
features:
Functions and Features

  • No center networking, flexible communication, high invulnerability ability;
  • Each node of identical configuration, flexible use;
  • Without antenna alignment, automatic search for the direction of communication;
  • Adopt multiple beam independent high speed switching function to realize the dynamic neighbor discovery, dynamic slot allocation and spatial multiplexing function;
  • The high frequency and the use of directional antenna communication, strong anti-interference ability;
  • Realizing communication between nodes of the peak value of 54Mbps high speed data transmission and the rate adaptive transmission function
  • Have network management interface, and support network link management function;
  • Support video transmission business with each other.

Composition

SDR5 consists of a number of nodes in the network, each node is the same configuration, mainly by the indoor unit (IDU), outdoor unit (ODU) and network management software, as shown in figure 1. Because of the high frequency to increase the communication distance, ODU need to use high frame, and through the photoelectric hybrid transmission cable and IDU connections
